name: Innofluence
goal: Accompagner, former, assister tout organisme cherchant à développer sa recherche et ses capacités d'innovation.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Politique d'innovation
Notamment à travers les programmes Horizon 2020, COSME, COST, Creative Europe ainsi que les fonds structurels
